quest.name: Saying Good-bye
journal: Runar lets out a sigh of relief.

With Toddia's heartstone safely returned to Runar, the Night's Blessed are able to proceed with her funeral service. To show his appreciation for your efforts, he insists that you and your comrades attend the service as honored guests. He then asks you to inform the others while he sees to preparations.

You find Minfilia telling Thancred of your recent undertaking in the woods. She is delighted by their invitation, and promises not to be late. With Y'shtola and Urianger toiling away to decipher the tablet, you decide not to disturb them and make for the Darker.
In the dimly lit cave you find an elderly woman you believe to be the attendant Runar spoke of. Without saying a word she hands you a candle, and points to a spot on the floor close by.

Seeing the cluster of candles there on the floor, you place yours among them, and the attendant nods and smiles in answer. It would appear you have done your part in preparing for the service. All you can do now is wait for it to begin.

Before long, a procession of mourners enter the Darker. Among them you find Y'shtola and Urianger, who have taken a reprieve from working to pay their respects. They join you in the rear of the chamber, and a hush soon falls over the room. Runar then enters taking his place at the Font of Seeing, and delivers a moving service in memory of Toddia. As the room clears, Y'shtola invites you to her chambers to discuss the tablet.
Y'shtola has finished deciphering the tablet and is prepared to reveal her findings. It will not be long before you track down the Lightwarden.
objectives: Place the candle at the destination.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Thancred, I can explain.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Well? Out with it, then.

dialogue.name: RUNAR
dialogue.text: Words fail to express my gratitude for this kindness you have done for the Blessed.

dialogue.name: RUNAR
dialogue.text: I must insist you and your friends attend Toddia's service as honored guests.

dialogue.name: RUNAR
dialogue.text: There is still much we must do to prepare, but please go and inform the others it will be held in the Darker.

dialogue.name: RUNAR
dialogue.text: When you arrive, there should be an attendant present to explain the proceedings.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Forename and I learned so much about the Night's Blessed while you were away.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: And we helped them recover a lost heirloom out in the woods. I know I wasn't supposed to leave, but they really needed our help! There were sin eaters, andâ”€

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: As long as shehe accompanied you. But do try to be more careful. Your injuries could have been a lot worse.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: H-How did you...?

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Let's just say a little bird told me. And it's telling me now that Forename has business with us.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Is something the matter?

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: They've asked us to attend the service?

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Of course we'll go. It's being held in the Darker, is it? We'll take care not to be late, I promise.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: It's such a relief to know everything is going as planned. I'll join you in the Darker shortly.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Between your earlier excursion and my patrol of the area for sin eaters, hopefully Y'shtola and Urianger will be able to finish their work in peace.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The elderly woman hands you a candle. She then points over at a nearby corner where you might place it.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Hopefully Y'shtola has good news to share.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: A chance to reclaim the night has lit a fire in Minfilia that I would see kindled.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: What do you suppose she's gleaned from the tablet?

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: I have no doubt thou wilt find the contents of the tablet most informative.

dialogue.name: RUNAR
dialogue.text: I had no right to involve you in our troubles. Still, without your help, today's service would not have been possible. The Night's Blessed are in your debt.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Good, you're here. Thanks to the Exarch's gift, our next course of action is now clear.
